data.enText: a person who is unable to stop taking harmful drugs

data.chText: 吸食海洛因 / 毒品 / 尼古丁成瘾的人

data.enText: a person who is very interested in sth and spends a lot of their free time on it

simple_means.memory_skill: ad 做…或加强 + dict〔= dic说〕→ 一再说起 → 上瘾

tr: someone who is physiologically dependent on a substance
abrupt deprivation of the substance produces withdrawal symptoms
someone who is so ardently devoted to something that it resembles an addiction
to cause (someone or oneself) to become dependent (on something, especially a narcotic drug)

value.def: An addict is someone who takes harmful drugs and cannot stop taking them.

example.ex: He's only 24 years old and a drug addict.
example.tran: 他只有24岁，却是个瘾君子。

value.def: If you say that someone is an addict, you mean that they like a particular activity very much and spend as much time doing it as they can.

example.ex: She is a TV addict and watches as much as she can.
example.tran: 她是个电视迷，看起电视来没完没了。

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to say, to assert 说；断言
rootsaffixes.title: dict, dic

partsOfSpeech.dec: ab 去掉 + dic 说；断言 + ate 做，造成，使… → 失去发言权 → 退位
ad 加强 + dict 说；断言 → 说了又说 → 上瘾
bene 好 + dict 说；断言 + ion 表动作 → 说好话 → 祝福
contra 相反 + dict 说；断言 → 说反对的话 → 反驳
contradict 反驳 + ory …的 → 矛盾的，对立的
dict 说；断言 + ate 做，造成，使… → 说话 → 口授
dictate的名词
dict 说；断言 + ion 表名词 → 说的话 → 措辞
diction 措辞 + ary 物 → 含有措辞的物 → 字典
e 出 + dict 说；断言 → 说出〔要求〕→ 法令；布告
in 加以… + dic 说；断言 + ate 做，造成，使… → 说出 → 指示
in 进入 + dict 说；断言 → 进〔法院〕讨个说法 → 起诉
inter 相互 + dict 说；断言 → 相互说〔不让做〕→ 禁令
juris 法律 + dict 说；断言 + ion 表名词 → 法律的说法 → 司法权
male〔= mal 坏〕+ dict 说；断言 + ion 表名词 → 说坏话 → 恶言
pre 预先 + dic 说；断言 + ate 做，造成，使… → 预先断言 → 断定
pre 前；预先 + dict 说；断言 → 预言；预告
ver 真实 + dict 说；断言 → 说真话 → 裁决
ad 做…或加强 + apt 适应 → 适应
ad 做…或加强 + dict〔= dic说〕→ 一再说起 → 上瘾
ad 做…或加强 + duc 引导 + e → 一再引导 → 引证，举例
ad 做…或加强 + ept 能力 → 很有能力 → 熟练的
ad 做…或加强 + her 粘 + e → 坚持；粘附
ad 做…或加强 + jac 躺 + ent 具有…性质的 → 躺在一起 → 邻近的
ad 做…或加强 + just 正确 → 使正确 → 调整
ad 做…或加强 + ministr 管理 + ate 做 → 管理；执行
ad 做…或加强 + mir 惊 + e → 很惊喜 → 羡慕
ad 做…或加强 + mon 警告 + ish 使… → 一再警告 → 告诫
ad 做…或加强 + opt 选择 → 做选择 → 采纳
ad 做…或加强 + umbr 影子 + ate 造成 → 出现影子 → 预示
ad 做…或加强 + vent 来 → 来临
ad 做…或加强 + venture 冒险 → 冒险
